extendedInfo.description: Everybody knows that you should never challenge a Yeti to a snowball fight. But with this little game you can have the fun without the danger!Don't get hit by the snowballs, collect the snow and upgrade your skills and power-ups to give those Yetis a taste of their own medicine. Use hats and boosters to gain the extra edge in your struggle with the yetis!Try to get a new highscore by avoiding the snowballs longer than everybody else - how high can you climb on the Snowival highscore ladder?
